question: So my 1st pregnancy went perfect with no problems. It was almost 4 years ago and I was 20\21. With this pregnancy(pregnancy number 2, 18 weeks 3 days) I I have been put on high blood pressure meds and done several tests because they had some not so good results come back on glucose test for gestational  diabetes. Does anyone else have any of the issue and how are you doing with everything?
title: Pregnancy issues such and high blood pressure and gestational  diabetes
